#NAMELISTS

----------------
&init
  num_inflaton=100
  potential_choice=1
  modpkoutput = .true.
  slowroll_infl_end = .true.
  instreheat = .false.
  vparam_rows = 1
/

----------------
NB: sampling_techn = {1=reg_samp, 2=eqen_samp, 3=slowroll_samp,
    4=fromfile_samp,5=parameter_loop_samp,6=isoN,
    7=param_unif_prior}

&ic_sampling
  sampling_techn = 6
  numb_samples = 1

  energy_scale = .1

  save_iso_N = .false.
  N_iso_ref = 60
  output_badic=.false.

  varying_N_pivot = .false.
/

----------------
NB: If sampling_techn=parameter_loop_samp, then the smallest vparams equals
the smallest mass; others are discarded.

&params
  N_pivot = 55
  k_pivot = 0.002
  dlnk = 0.4

  phi_init0 = 5.0
